trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SEQ_00<tab>Serendipity is quite pleased to see you.

TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SEQ_01<tab>Roroton, the merchant for whom you previously crafted a pair of malachite earrings, has commissioned you to make a fire brand of peerless quality. Craft the item to the best of your ability and present it to Serendipity for inspection.

TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SEQ_02<tab>As usual, Gigi assists with the evaluation of your work. However, in an unusual turn of events, your fire brand appears to trigger bizarre pyromaniac tendencies hidden deep within the mammet's soul. Nevertheless, Serendipity assures you that there is no need for concern, and that she will see that Roroton receives his order without incident.
※The next goldsmith quest will be available from Serendipity upon reaching level 40.
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_TODO_00<tab>Deliver a fire brand <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Serendipity.
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_001<tab>I've been waiting for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_002<tab>You remember Roroton, the merchant for whom you made those exquisite earrings? He paid a visit not long ago, hoping to find you present. In fact, he was positively heartbroken that he couldn't speak with you in person.
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_003<tab>Ahaha, it's hard to believe he was once so furious with us! It's as if that unfortunate incident never happened at all!
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_004<tab>But returning to the matter at hand, Roroton has commissioned you to craft a fire brand─one of peerless quality, of course.

TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_005<tab>When you've finished, I must insist that I evaluate your work. It's not that I don't trust your craftsmanship, but Roroton is an important client, to say the least.
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_010<tab>Is the fire brand ready yet, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_011<tab>All right, Gigi! I know this is your first evaluation in a long while, but I'm sure you can handle it!
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_GIGI_000_012<tab>NE※GIGIGI★※... FiRe...BrAnD...bUrN, bUrN, mAkE iT bUrN tHeM!
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_GIGI_000_013<tab>GiGi Is ThE oNe TrUe LoRd Of ThE iNfErNo! MwAhAhAhAh!!!
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_014<tab>No, Gigi, <var 1A 02 /var>no<var 1A 01 /var>! What did I tell you!? <var 1A 02 /var>No fires<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_015<tab>Please forgive him, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I might have knocked something loose when performing maintenance earlier...

TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_016<tab>But I'm certain it's nothing important. Really! Other than the occasional outburst, he's been relatively stable. ...Well, for <var 1A 02 /var>Gigi<var 1A 01 /var>, anyway.

TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_017<tab>Ah, yes, the scepter! I must say that you've once again done a marvelous job. I'm particularly impressed by how well you set the eye of fire in the scepter.

TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_018<tab>This gemstone is the focal point of the design, both aesthetically and practically speaking. It is what allows a thaumaturge to channel the aetherial energies within...
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_019<tab>And it's what transforms the piece from common instrument of death into stunning work of art!
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_020<tab>Any veteran thaumaturge would doubtless be satisfied by both the quality and efficacy of this fire brand. I just know Roroton will be happy to receive it!
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_GIGI_000_021<tab>I sAy We GiVe HiM tHe GiFt ThAt KeEpS oN gIvInG! i SaY wE gIvE hIm ThE gIfT oF fIrE!
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_022<tab>Gigi! There will be absolutely no gift giving on my watch! Have I made myself clear!?
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_023<tab><sigh> You can leave the rest to me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'll see that Roroton receives your fire brand─and nothing else!
